Description: (1) Go to rtice -> PQ -> Debug -> VIP_Table_Access V0.5
(2) Set ID = 2200, Start Address = End Address = Mode0 = Mode1 = 0
Note: After reselecting the source or changing the timing (e.g., when a black screen mask appears), NNSR and RTNR may be re-enabled automatically.
RTNR cannot be disabled in interlace mode.
